entry.title: Deterministic Entropy From BIP32 Keychains
entry.summary: In this email, Rodolfo Novak from Coinkite Inc. is asking about the implementation of the Deterministic Entropy From BIP32 Keychains on Coldcard. He is asking if there is a BIP number assigned to this implementation and if there has been any review of it yet. The email also includes Rodolfo's contact information and GPG signature.
